name: Fire Fighting Faun
description:
The Firelings are invading the Faun's Magic Forest. To close the fire pit from where the Firelings escape, the Faun has to restore the 8 sacred trees to their full potential! But he has little time, as the Firelord is coming! Stomp your enemies and restore the magic trees with your wand!

Made for the Global Game Jam 2020 by:

Gianluca Migliavacca: Game Designer
Gonzalo Perez Lugones: Game Designer
Priscilla Conigliaro: 2D Artist, Game Designer
Tomas Carceglia: Programmer,  Game Designer

Music and SFX were taken from freesound.org and soundimage.org (by Eric Matyas)
